benefits: Tactical Squads gain the Line unit type
Tactical Squads may re-roll failed Morale checks
ritesOfWar.description: A force built around the core strength of the Legion - its Tactical Squads
ritesOfWar.name: Pride of the Legion
restrictions: Must include at least 3 Troops choices
No more than 2 Fast Attack choices
No more than 2 Heavy Support choices

benefits: All Armour units gain the Line unit type
Armour units may re-roll failed Morale checks
ritesOfWar.description: A mechanised force built around tanks and armoured vehicles
ritesOfWar.name: Armoured Spearhead
restrictions: Must include at least 2 Armour choices

benefits: All units with Jump Packs or Terminator Armour gain the Line unit type
Units with Jump Packs or Terminator Armour may re-roll failed Morale checks
ritesOfWar.description: A force designed for rapid deployment via drop pods and teleportation
ritesOfWar.name: Orbital Assault
restrictions: Must include at least 2 Fast Attack choices

benefits: All Fast Attack units gain the Line unit type
Fast Attack units may re-roll failed Morale checks
ritesOfWar.description: A force built around air superiority and rapid strike capabilities
ritesOfWar.name: Sky Hunters
restrictions: Must include at least 2 Fast Attack choices

benefits: All War Engine units gain the Line unit type
War Engine units may re-roll failed Morale checks
ritesOfWar.description: A force built around the mightiest war machines of the Legion
ritesOfWar.name: The Lords of War
restrictions: Must include at least 2 War Engine choices

benefits: All Heavy Support units gain the Line unit type
Heavy Support units may re-roll failed Morale checks
ritesOfWar.description: A force built around overwhelming firepower and heavy support
ritesOfWar.name: Massive Onslaught
restrictions: Must include at least 2 Heavy Support choices
